name: SubjectInBox
description:
Describe it? I dont know how to describe it, ragdolls, slowmotion, a cube to play with...
Is my first game, or the first i publish. Im really happy with it.

Controlls 

- Move [W,A,S,D]
- Jump [SPACE]
- Grab/Drop [E]
- Change view mode [Q]

0.2 - 13/12/20
-Better performace
-First person mode
